meanings.definition: Make a characteristic high-pitched sound, as a horse does.
meanings.sent1: The horse was neighing loudly in the field.
meanings.sent2: I heard a horse neighing in the distance.
meanings.sent3: The neighing of the horse interrupted the peaceful morning.
meanings.sent4: Her laughter echoed through the room, neighing like a joyful horse.
meanings.sent5: The neighing of the horse was so loud, it could be heard across the farm.

meanings.definition: The act of making a characteristic high-pitched sound, as a horse does.
meanings.sent1: I love the sound of a horse's neighing.
meanings.sent2: The neighing of the horses filled the air at the ranch.
meanings.sent3: The neighing of the horse always brings a smile to my face.
meanings.sent4: In the distance, the neighing of the horses sounded like music.
meanings.sent5: The neighing of the horse was a familiar sound on the farm.
